title: Induced current - loop of wire_changing B-field

content.question: A single loop of wire with resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> is placed in a magnetic field that is directed into the page, as shown. The loop is a square with each side having a length <math alttext="s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>s</mi></math>. The magnitude of the magnetic field as a function of time is given by <math alttext="B of t equals, 4 t cubed plus 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></math>. What is the magnitude of the current induced in the wire due to the changing magnetic field as a function of time?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, t to the fourth power, plus 3 t, close parenthesis, times s squared, and denominator R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>R</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, t to the fourth power, plus 3 t, close parenthesis, times s squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 12 t squared, times s squared, and denominator R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>R</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="12 t squared, times s squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 12 t squared, times s squared, and denominator R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>R</mi></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
